resources.string: Mostra il tuo sostegno alla ROM Resurrection Remix
Ottieni maggiori informazioni sulla Resurrection Remix
Essere un membro del forum Resurrection Remix
Guarda i recenti cambiamenti della Resurrection Remix
Lascia che la gente sa che utilizzate la Resurrection Remix
Premere sul colore qui sotto per applicare
Display extra info for cpu, display, etc
Enable for poly hd images. Disable for original images.
Display extra info for cpu, display, etc
Include foreground task when clearing all
Show a bar with the device\s available memory
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Double tap on the top third or the bottom shortcut area to sleep
Reboot Might Be needed For Changes To Take Effect
Blurs and displays the content behind your lockscreen.
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Press on color below to apply
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Double tap navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Dim navigation bar buttons after not interacting with navigation bar for a specified time
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
Posizione barra batteria e colore personalizzato
L\'animazione di ricarica può causare una scarsa esperienza utente. Attiva a propria discrezione.
Scegli azione con la pressione prolungata:
Il numero massimo di voci dimensioni è stato raggiunto
Non è possibile cancellare ultima voce
Disabilita\nAggiungere una voce per abilitare questa funzione
L\'applicazione scelta non ha restituito l\'icona valido o non supporta ritaglio immagine. Utilizzare un\'altra applicazione.
L\'azione scelta non può essere aggiunto due volte
,mentre selezionando l\'icona, si hanno le opzioni di personalizzazione

Per aggiungere una %1$s, seleziona l'icona Aggiungi. Una volta aggiunta, selezionando la riga cambierà il target%2$s

Per rimuovere una %1$s,strisciare la riga in orizzontale verso sinistra o verso destra. Riordinare una %1$s nella lista verticale trascinando l'ancora a sinistra.

Per cancellare o ripristinare le impostazioni, selezionare l'opzione reset. La rimozione di ogni %1$s nella lista si disattivano tutte le funzionalità.
La rimozione di ogni %1$s dalla lista disattiverà la funzione del tutto.
La rimozione di ogni %1$s nella lista disattiverà il secondo strato del controllo pie del tutto.
Change the shortcuts on lockscreen to whatever you want
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Add, remove, and position items in the sidebar
Position the sidebar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the sidebar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Enable to show logo on the left side of statusbar
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk
Shows icon when headsets are connected.
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
This will hide all force close notificaitons
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Enable orange status and navigation bars when battery saver is activated
Select where the weather temperature is shown on the statusbar
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Show power menu on the lock screen
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Customize PA Pie 2.0 targets, sytle, size and color
Whether or not the menu button should always be shown, even when its not needed
Select the location where the Pie will be placed
Adjust the gap that separates the Pie elements
Adjust the angle of pie\'s egdes from the attachment
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Enable expand quick settings panel button
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area.
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
